name: Everything Satoshi
cooked: How much of Ocean’s data, puts into consideration, their DATUM server, which gives hashers opportunity to generate their own Block template, and edit the miner tag. This I believe is a nuance worthy of noting. Thoughts?
topic_title: Analyzing Mining Pool Behavior to Address Bitcoin Core's Double Coinbase Reservation Issue
topic_html_title: Analyzing Mining Pool Behavior to Address Bitcoin Core’s Double Coinbase Reservation Issue
raw: How much of Ocean's data, puts into consideration, their DATUM server, which gives hashers opportunity to generate their own Block template, and edit the miner tag. This I believe is a nuance worthy of noting. Thoughts?
